Package it.unicam.cs.followme.app

Class ApplicationController

java.lang.Object
it.unicam.cs.followme.app.ApplicationController
public class ApplicationController extends Object
This class is responsible for the simulation of the swarm of robot with JAVAFX. Initialize all the elements in the view and manage the simulation from begin to end
